## Pairwise understanding of biodiversity maintenance (examples)

:::{.incremental}

- climate <span style="color:#4EBF7B">variability</span> has a stabilising effect in the community^d^, but climatic <span style="color:#4EBF7B">extremes</span> lead to lower probability of coexistence^e^

- the inferior competitor arriving first can generate <span style="color:#4EBF7B">close-to-neutrality</span> situations (low niche and fitness differences)^f^

- correlations between <span style="color:#4EBF7B">functional traits</span> and fitness differences are clear but not so much with niche differences^g^

- <span style="color:#4EBF7B">phylogeny</span> does not predict coexistence mechanisms, against expectations^h,i^

- etc.

:::
